definition: meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The meaning of vicious beauty can be sensed in this gentle smile.
sentences.chinese: 蛇蠍美人的含義，大概全在這溫柔的一笑中了。

sentences.english: Fifth, there are equal spaces between words and non-meaning-unit characters.
sentences.chinese: 第五，有平等的詞與詞之間的空間和非含義單位字符。

sentences.english: The next, cleared the definiens of culture localization and its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 其次，明確了文化本土化的含義及其意義。

sentences.english: The proposed model of our country's railway management system reform is "Separation of infrastructure from operation".
sentences.chinese: 提出了網運分離條件下旅客列車運行線管理的含義。

sentences.english: Different kinds of right to resist have different meanings.
sentences.chinese: 不同層面的抵抗權有不同的含義。

sentences.english: And that means different things in different societies.
sentences.chinese: 這一點在不同社會中有着不同含義。

sentences.english: All these usages line up well with the dictionary definitions I turned up.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些用法和我查閱的字典裏的含義相當一致。

sentences.english: But there's another meaning given to shepherds as well.
sentences.chinese: 但是還有另一個附加在牧羊人上的含義。

sentences.english: Imperium has its territorial basis and non-territorial implications.
sentences.chinese: 帝權以領土爲基礎，同時又有非領土層面的含義。

sentences.english: The divinatory texts are a synthesis of the meanings proposed by many experts.
sentences.chinese: 卦文是一個綜合的含義提出了許多專家。

sentences.english: This perspective reflects the image of an Arrowhead.
sentences.chinese: 這個角度形象化地表達了箭頭的含義。

sentences.english: The meaning of the sapphire is elegant pure beauty, romantic and sincere happiness.
sentences.chinese: 寶藍色的含義是優雅純潔的美，浪漫真摯的幸福。

sentences.english: Vagueness makes it difficult to understand the meaning of a tag.
sentences.chinese: 含糊性使人們很難理解標籤的含義。

sentences.english: Can you tell me the meaning of this Emblem?
sentences.chinese: 你能通知我這個會標的含義嗎？

sentences.english: He contorted the document out of its proper meaning.
sentences.chinese: 他曲解了文件的正確含義。

sentences.english: Can understand the meaning of bombardment degassing , we know why.
sentences.chinese: 只要明白轟擊去氣的含義，我們就知道爲什麼了。

definition: vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
